job_description: In this Co-op position you will be working with senior engineers in:- Data gathering and analysis related to the steelmaking process- Automating tedious data gathering and analysis tasks- Observing production processes to ensure measured data matches reality
job_requirements: The incumbent will be registered and be in goodstanding in an undergraduate or graduate Engineering program. All disciplines will be considered, however, Industrial, Electronic, Process, or Computer students will be given preference.  Strong statistical and analytical skills are required. The incumbent must be proficient in Microsoft Excel.  Numerical simulation and data analysis experience and software development experience are considered assets.  A valid drivers license is helpful but not required.Open To All Majors:No
